page.title: 18Transport in Leafield.
page.content: The most popular means of transport in our village is a bicycle.Many people own cars.The most common makes are Ford and Volvo.The most common colours are red,white and blue-the colours of the Union Jack.Most of the cars are two years old,but the oldest is twenty-five years old.Many children own a B.M.X.bike. There is a bus to Witney once a week,a free bus to Moreton market on Tuesdays and a private minibus to Witney on Saturdays. We did a traffic census at Fairspear Road T-junction: From 1.45 to 2.15pm. on a Wednesday afternoon in May, 44 cars,7 vans,5 lorries,1 minibus,1 motor-bike and 2 prams passed.
